Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Foster, Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, Foster and Damen due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Foster, Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, Foster, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near South Shore/70th
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses temp. rerouted SB: Jeffery, 73rd, Exchange, 75th, & South Shore; NB: South Shore, 71st, Jeffery, & 67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near South Shore/70th, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Jeffery, 73rd, Exchange, 75th, & South Shore.

Northbound buses will operate via South Shore, 71st, Jeffery, & 67th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Sedgwick. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Sedgwick.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
